website_summaries.verdict: The long-lasting, waterproof design and deep cleaning results make this brush a constant crowd-pleaser. Worth the investment.
pros: Uses oscillation technology to flush pores with water for deep cleaning
Two speeds for gentler or more powerful scrubbing
cons: The price is steep compared to other face cleansing brushes on the market

customer_reviews.title: Two very satisfied users
customer_reviews.text: I have never used a face cleansing brush before, but now I am kicking myself for not trying them sooner. I did my research before I purchased this one, plus I got one for my wife who has been using cheap versions that spin. I really notice a big difference in the cleanliness of my face. Now, my pores have been cleaned out and are much smaller. My wife was surprised by how much cleaner her face feels with the Clarisonic Mia Smart Sonic Facial Cleansing Brush. She is very careful with what she puts on her face and how she cleans her face. This is her first Clarisonic device and it gets two thumbs up from her.
customer_reviews.author: Mirinda

customer_reviews.title: Yes and No
customer_reviews.text: I'm sorry i did not get the Clarisonic system a long time ago. I purchased many of the heads with the smart acne. The pore brush does make my pores smaller after each use but i have to say the pore acne cleanser makes me break out completely. Thats just my experience. I will enjoy everything else about the system. Love It!

customer_reviews.title: Great for my skin
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been using it regularly for several weeks now and I have noticed a significant change in my skin. I’ve seen a huge decrease in the number of break outs, my face feels much softer, and it’s been less oily compared to before using it. It’s even helped minimize the big, cystic acne I get on my jawline. The charge lasts forever and I like that it’s waterproof so you can use it in the shower (I usually wash my face in the shower in the morning so it’s nice to not have to change up routine). Overall, super happy with it!
customer_reviews.author: MyOhMy

customer_reviews.title: face cleansing brush
customer_reviews.text: Heard many things about facial cleaning brushes but with sensitive skin, I never thought to try one. This one was recommended though so I thought I'd try it. The set came complete with a brush, extra 'head', and solution/soap...everything you need. The brush is easy to hold, wide enough to not cramp your hand if you grip it; the brush not to abrasive to cause skin irritation. Definitely feels like my face is CLEAN after using it
customer_reviews.author: Miranda

customer_reviews.title: Works pretty well and makes my face feel better
customer_reviews.text: I wasn’t sure what to expect from the Clarisonic facial cleaner and was a bit intimidated by them. I thought I did a good job at face washing but after a week with the Clarisonic, I was wrong. My face feels a lot better and cleaner - the only equivalent I can think of is that it’s like a sonicare but for your face. As a guy I didn’t expect to like this but it’s awesome. The only downside is the cost. It’s pricey, for sure, but wallet pain is real.
customer_reviews.author: Nick

customer_reviews.title: Astounding!
customer_reviews.text: I personally had never heard of this facial cleanser but decided to get it as a Christmas gift for my mother, taking in consideration the price (not that cheap), i believed this would be a nice gift. And indeed, my mother loved this so much she is recommending it to all her girlfriends. She complimented everything, from the packaging, durability and main the effect on your skin. No more acne!

customer_reviews.title: Great for skin

My skin looks brighter. The head does not rotate and pull skin. It’s almost like a giant electric toothbrush for your face.

customer_reviews.title: Others don't compare!
customer_reviews.text: I went through a few other electric face cleaners and none compare to the Mia by Clarsonic. I use this at least once a day usually because it's so gentle on my skin, which is quite sensitive, but still gives me a good clean/exfoliation. I like the Bluetooth aspect but honestly don't use it the app much. I would definitely recommend this product to family and friends. It's a staple!

product_meta.title: Clarisonic Mia Smart Facial Cleansing Brush Acne Prevention Gift Set
product_meta.description:
This set includes all the must haves for acne prone skin. Deep clean clogged pores and eliminate excess shine with Clarisonic Mia Smart Deluxe Acne Cleansing Kit. Award winning Mia Smart works with the Acne Facial Cleansing Brush Head and Pore & Blemish cleanser to remove 99 percent of oil, makeup and impurities through the power of sonic cleansing. Connect to the Clarisonic app to upload personalized routines for your specific needs.

Clarisonic is the #1 cleansing device recommended by U.S. dermatologists* and the #1 at-home beauty device brand in the U.S.**

*Based on a 2016 survey of 424 U.S. dermatologists who recommend cleansing devices.
**Based on 2017 Kline Report (Beauty Devices: U.S. Market Analysis and Opportunities).



BRAND STORY
Clarisonic entered the beauty industry in 2004 with the world’s first patented sonic technology skincare device. Today, Clarisonic is one of the leaders in skincare-driven technologies engineered for beauty.
